condition.narrative: Railway Directorate (RD) Agreement. To facilitate the carrying out of the Project, not later than one month after the EffectiveDate, the Borrower, through MCTI shall enter into an agreement with RD, under terms and conditions approved by the Bank (“RDAgreement”), including, inter alia, RD's obligation to support the implementation of the Project in accordance to the provisions ofthis Agreement, the Project Operations Manual, the Anti-Corruption Guidelines and the ESCP.

Serbia Cargo Agreement. To facilitate the carrying out of the Project, not later than one month after the Effective Date, theBorrower, through MCTI shall enter into an agreement with Serbia Cargo, under terms and conditions approved by the Bank (“SerbiaCargo Agreement”), including, inter alia, Serbia Cargo's obligation to support the implementation of the Project in accordance tothe provisions of this Agreement, the Project Operations Manual, the Anti-Corruption Guidelines and the ESCP.

Serbia Railways Infrastructure (IZS) Agreement. To facilitate the carrying out of the Project, not later than one month after theEffective Date, the Borrower, through MCTI shall enter into an agreement with IZS, under terms and conditions approved by the Bank(“IZS Agreement”), including, inter alia, IZss obligation to support the implementation of the Project in accordance to theprovisions of this Agreement, the Project Operations Manual, the Anti-Corruption Guidelines and the ESCP.

Serbia Voz Agreement. To facilitate the carrying out of the Project, not later than one month after the Effective Date, theBorrower, through MCTI shall enter into an agreement with Serbia Voz, under terms and conditions approved by the Bank (“Serbia VozAgreement”), including, inter alia, Serbia Voz's obligation to support the implementation of the Project in accordance to theprovisions of this Agreement, the Project Operations Manual, the Anti-Corruption Guidelines and the ESCP.

The Borrower shall exercise its rights under the RD Agreement, IZS Agreement, Serbia Cargo Agreement and Sebia Voz Agreement, insuch manner as to protect the interests of the Borrower and the Bank and to accomplish the purposes of the Loan. Except as theBank shall otherwise agree, the Borrower shall not assign, amend, abrogate or waive the RD Agreement, IZS Agreement, Serbia CargoAgreement and Sebia Voz Agreement or any of their provisions.

title.narrative: PrDO: Increase national freight rail market share by 10 percent ton-km (from 22.5 percent to 24.74 percent of the market)
PrDO: Increase the national passenger rail market share by 30 percent (pass-km) (from 3.5 percent to 4.63 percent of the market)
PrDO: Reduce fatality rates on the rail network by 23 percent (fatalities per train-kilometers) (from 3.56 to 2.74 fatalities per train-kilometers)
Reduce accidents at level crossings per year by 25 percent (from 43 to 32 crashes per year)
Increase network utilization by 5 percent (from 8.10 and to 8.5 daily train-kilometers per network track kilometer)
Phase 1: Number of level crossings upgraded
Phase 1: PhD scholarships in rail-related subjects awarded to females
Phase 1: Number of measurement stations installed
Phase 1: Percentage of beneficiaries reporting project established effective engagement processes
Phase 1: Increase average train speeds on rehabilitated sections (kmh)
Phase 1: Training programs in RD, IZS, SC and SV implemented
Phase 1: Action plan for IRS implementation delivered
Phase 1: Analysis and road map for ownership structure of SC delivered
Phase 1: Delivery of a plan for achieving integration of components of asset management system
Phase 1: Delivery of fully functioning asset management system
Phase 1: Gender Action Plans adopted by RD, IZS, SC and SV
Phase 1: HR strategies for RD, IZS, SC and SV delivered and implemented
Phase 1: IRS demonstration project implemented and documented
Phase 1: Legal and regulatory instruments developed to modernize RD's role as regulator
Phase 1: Pilot projects on integrated rail-territorial development implemented
Phase 1: Recommendations delivered for IZS, SC and SV to adopt commercially oriented, independent, and modern management
Phase 1: Recommendations delivered for SC to adopt modernized business processes
Phase 1: SMS action plan is delivered
Phase 1: Second stage of main railway station in Belgrade center constructed
Phase 1: Selected SMS and resilience interventions are implemented
Phase 1: Study on integration of railways with territorial development delivered
Phase 1: Study on modal shift delivered
Contingency plan under Safety Management System is operationalized
IZS rehabilitation plans are based on outputs from Asset Management System
New hiring/recruitment procedures are based on the HR strategy
Phase 1: Improve financial transparency in IZS, SC, SV, and RD
Phase 1: Number of staff trained in safety risk assessment in RD, IZS, and SV
PrDO: Safety risk assessment operationalized and implemented
Phase 1: Equipment for maintenance and rehabilitation of railway assets operational
Phase 1: Software for Timetable construction for IZS implemented
